Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms provide a mini bar, heating and a flat-screen TV. They all have ironing facilities, a bathtub and a telephone. Paris's attractions, such as Porte Maillot, Palais Des Congres De Paris and Avenue Victor-Hugo, are within easy walking distance of Hotel Residence Foch. Guests can also visit Place Charles de Gaulle and the Arc De Triomphe.Revato

name: Hotel Eiffel Seine
description: This Art Nouveau styled hotel is located beside the River Seine, just a 10-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. Bir-Hakeim Metro Station is directly opposite the hotel and offers easy access to all of Paris’s famous sights, such as the Arc de Triomphe. The air-conditioned rooms are contemporary in style and offer free WiFi. They feature double glazed windows, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The Hotel Eiffel Seine also has a bar with a lounge area. A buffet breakfast is either served in the hotel dining room, on the terrace or in guests’ rooms. There is a 24-hour front desk with laundry facilities at the property. All rooms at the Hotel Eiffel Seine are serviced by a lift. The Hotel Eiffel Seine is 800 metres from Jardins du Trocadero and 1.1 km from Musée du quai Branly.

name: Bailli De Suffren
description: This design hotel is located in a residential district, just a 10-minute walk from the famous Eiffel Tower. It offers design rooms decorated with colourful photos of Paris. The modern guest rooms at the Bailli Tour Eiffel are air conditioned and soundproofed. They are each is equipped with free Wi-Fi and a tea and coffee making facilities. A buffet breakfast is served every morning, which can be enjoyed in the breakfast room or in the privacy of the guest rooms. Facilities at the Bailli Tour Eiffel include a lift and a 24-hour reception. There is also a concierge and car hire service. The hotel is just a few steps from the Unesco building and the Necker hospital. It is less than 100 metres from the Ségur Metro stop.

name: Hotel Le 10 Bis
description: Situated in Paris, Hotel Le 10 BIS offers stylish, 4-star accommodation close to Palais Des Congres De Paris. Guests can also enjoy complimentary wireless internet. The hotel has 23 rooms and has been recently refurbished. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar, a coffee maker and a refrigerator. Each one features a flat-screen TV with cable channels, as well as a private bathroom. Hotel Le 10 BIS serves breakfast every morning, and guests are welcome to unwind with a drink in the lounge bar. A wide selection of dining options are also found in the area. Hotel Le 10 BIS is close to Porte Maillot Metro Station, making it easy for guests to explore Paris and its surrounding areas. Place Charles de Gaulle, Avenue Victor-Hugo and the Arc De Triomphe are each within walking distance.Revato

name: Hôtel Régence Etoile
description: Regence Etoile hotel is located a 3-minute walk from the Champs-Elysées and Arc de Triomphe. It offers elegant, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi internet access. All rooms at Regence Etoile are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and an en suite bathroom or shower room. Some rooms have a balcony or a terrace, and those overlooking Avenue Carnot offer a view of the Arc de Triomphe. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room. Guests may also enjoy drinks in the hotel’s lounge and bar. Regence Etoile offers a concierge service and a 24-hour reception desk. A coach service to Charles de Gaulle Airport is available a 2-minute walk from the hotel. Charles de Gaulle Etoile Metro and Train Station is 280 metres away and offers a direct train link to the business district La Défense, Opera Garnier and Disneyland Paris.

name: 9Hotel Bastille - Lyon
description: 9Hotel Bastille-Lyon is a 5-minute walk from Gare de Lyon and 600 metres from the lively Bastille district. It offers free Wi-Fi access and rooms with satellite TV. Rooms at 9Hotel Bastille-Lyon are decorated in creams and yellows and offer a work desk and a private safe. Each is air-conditioned and also features a private bathroom. Buffet breakfast is served every morning in the hotel’s breakfast room. Additional facilities include a cold drinks vending machine and luggage storage in the 24-hour reception. Gare de Lyon Metro Station provides direct access to Paris’ sights such as Le Louvre, Avenue Champs Elysées the Marais district. Guests can also walk to Bercy in 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Bloum
description: Villa La Parisienne is a popular choice amongst travelers in Paris, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, room service are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Television LCD/plasma screen, additional bathroom, additional toilet, mirror, closet can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Paris, Villa La Parisienne will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Pavillon Opera Grands Boulevards
description: Located a 10 minute walk from Galeries Lafayette and Opéra Garnier, this boutique hotel offers heated rooms with a minibar. The Montmartre district is a 20-minute walk away. Guest rooms at Pavillon Opéra Grands Boulevards feature satellite TV and a safety deposit box. Each room has a modern en suite bathroom and is serviced by a lift. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in Pavillon Opéra’s breakfast room or in guests’ rooms upon request. In the evening, guests are invited to relax in the hotel’s bar with a drink. Free Wi-Fi is available in the lobby area of the hotel that is decorated. The reception desk is open 24 hours a day and offers a reservation service for excursions. Metro Stations Grands Boulevards is a 5-minute walk from the hotel and offers direct access to Bastille and The Marais.

name: Hotel le Saint Gregoire
description: This 18th-century building is located in central Paris, just a 20-minute walk from the River Seine and the Louvre. It offers stylish and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TVs. Each guest room at Le Saint Gregoire is soundproofed and has a private bathroom. Some rooms also have a private terrace. Guests can enjoy an evening drink in the hotel bar and a continental breakfast is served every morning. The hotel reception is open 24 hours a day and Wi-Fi access is available. Le Saint Gregoire is just a few steps from the Saint Placide Metro Station and a 5-minute walk from Montparnasse. The Jardin du Luxembourg is just 500 metres away.

name: Hôtel de La Boétie
description: Hotel de la Boétie is located just 300 metres from the famous Avenue Champs Elysées. It offers a 24-hour reception and a modern bar with armchairs and sofas. Rooms at Hotel de la Boétie are individually decorated and offer a TV with satellite channels. Some rooms are interconnecting and all have access to the Wi-Fi connection. An American breakfast is served in the breakfast room every day. Additional facilities include a meeting room and luggage storage in the reception. The hotel is 160 metres from Saint-Philippe-du-Roule Metro Station and 700 metres from George V. They both lead directly to sights such as Le Marais, Le Louvre and Galleries Lafayette department store.

name: Passy Eiffel
description: Passy Eiffel is just 700 metres from Trocadéro, which offers the best views of the Eiffel Tower. It offers 3-star accommodation in one of Paris’ calm and safe streets. Rooms at Passy Eiffel are contemporary in style and offer a minibar and a TV with satellite channels. All are air-conditioned and some have views of the Eiffel Tower. The hotel serves a continental breakfast in the breakfast room or in the guest rooms. Additional facilities include a shuttle service to the airport and major train stations with extra fee. Passy Metro Station is just 250 metres from the hotel and provides direct access to the capital’s sights. The Arc de Triomphe, the Champs Elysées and Montparnasse can be accessed directly.

name: Hotel de Suede Saint Germain
description: Hotel de Suede is a charming hotel in the heart of Paris. It is situated close to the Rodin Museum, the Musée d'Orsay and Saint-Germain-des-Prés. Guest rooms at the Hotel de Suede are air-conditioned. They are equipped with en suite facilities, satellite TV and a work desk. Some have a view of the Matignon private gardens. Breakfast is available daily and served in the peaceful interior garden on nice days. Other services include Wi-Fi, a 24-hour front desk and room service. The Hotel De Suede Saint Germain is close to Metro stops serving lines 10, 12 and 13. Guests are well connected to the rest of the city.

name: Elysees Union Hotel
address: 44 Rue de l Amiral Hamelin, 75116 Paris
description: Conveniently located in the centre of the city, this 3-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Paris. Those staying at the property can also make use of free Wi-Fi during their stay. This luxury hotel offers family facilities, such as babysitting/child services. The front desk operates 24/7 and the friendly staff can suggest places to visit and provide other tourist information. Hotel Elysees Union features air conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV and a coffee maker. They have an en suite bathroom with a private bath or shower and a hair dryer. Elysées Union's restaurant is open for breakfast and is a suitable place for those who want to stay close to everything the property has on offer. Each evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. Hotel Elysees Union Paris is close to Trocadero Metro Station, making it easy for guests to discover Paris and its surrounding areas. It is also within walking distance of Seine, the Arc De Triomphe and Place Charles de Gaulle.Revato

name: Grand Hotel Dechampaigne
description: The Grand Hotel Dechampaigne is just a 5-minute walk from Le Louvre and the Notre Dame, in central Paris. It offers rooms with Louis XIII-period décor and furniture. Each room at the Dechampaigne is equipped with free Wi-Fi access, a private bathroom with a bathtub or shower and satellite TV. Breakfast is served in the rooms each morning and guests can enjoy gluten-free produce for breakfast upon request. Guests of the Grand Hotel can enjoy a drink in the bar, which features original 16th century furnishings. The hotel also has a souvenir shop and provides a 24-hour reception. Between Rivoli Street and the River Seine, the Dechampaigne Grand Hotel is situated less than 100 metres from Chatelet Metro Station, which provides direct access to Orly Airport and Charles de Gaulle Airport.

name: Padam Hôtel
description: Padam Hôtel has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Paris. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 2.6 km from the city centre and less than 1 km from Arc de Triomphe. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Padam Hôtel features some rooms that have a balcony, and all rooms come with a kettle. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options. Padam Hôtel offers 4-star accommodation with a hammam. Eiffel Tower is 1.5 km from the hotel, while Musée de l'Orangerie is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 17 km from Padam Hôtel.

name: Hotel Park Lane Paris
description: This 4-star boutique hotel is 750 metres from the Galeries Lafayette department store. Some of the guest rooms feature a private balcony overlooking the city’s rooftops. A flat-screen TV, an iPhone station and a minibar are included in all of the soundproofed and air-conditioned guest rooms. They also feature an espresso coffee machine and includes free WiFi access. The private bathrooms offer free toiletries, bathrobes and a hairdryer. Cocktails are served in the hotel bar, which is open 24 hours a day. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room at Hotel Park Lane Paris, or in guests' room upon request. With a 24-hour reception, the hotel offers a tour desk, a ticket service and a fitness room. Massages are also available. Miromesnil Metro Station is 280 metres away, providing access to the Champs Elysées. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Le Littre
description: Hotel Le Littré is set in Paris, between St Germain des Pres and Montparnasse, 100 metres from Rue de Rennes shopping district. Set in a building originally built in the early 20th century, it offers modern and soundproofed rooms with panoramic views over the city. The air-conditioned rooms and suites are equipped with free WiFi access, double glazed windows, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Bathrobes and slippers are provided in all rooms. Some rooms have a separate living area and a balcony or terrace with views of the capital. The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast with American, gluten-free and continental options in the dining area. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar. In addition to a 24-hour reception, Le Littré provides a laundry and dry cleaning service as well as business facilities. All rooms and suites are serviced by 2 lifts. There is also a veranda and a sauna. Saint Placide Metro Station and Montparnasse Train Station is 350 metres from Hotel Le Littré, providing easy access to Paris's many sites such as Saint Michel and Chatelet. A private secured parking is available with an extra charge.

name: Hôtel Hélios Opéra
description: This eco-friendly hotel is just a 5-minute walk from the Galeries Lafayette department store and the Opéra Garnier. Sacré-Coeur Basilica can be easily reached through Trinité d'Estienne d'Orves Metro Station. Hélios Opéra is entirely non-smoking and offers air-conditioned guest rooms with a design décor. The modern rooms, entirely nonsmoking, are equipped with air-conditioning, free broad band WiFi, laundry service, private safe, minibar, flat-screen TV (satellite and cable), free tea and coffee making facilities. The Deluxe and Executive rooms additionally offer a Nespresso Machine, bathrobe and slippers to the guests. A buffet breakfast is served daily in the dining room at hotel Hélios Opéra. It features local products, a cheese plate and organic and fair-trade products. After breakfast, guests can use the computer with internet access in the lobby, which features a stained-glass roof. With a 24-hour reception, Hélios Opéra also provides a tour desk and ticket service. The multilingual staff is at your disposal and will be glad to help you to organise your stay in Paris. Chaussée d’Antin – La Fayette Metro Station is 290 metres away, providing direct access to the Louvre Museum and the Champs Elysées. the Eiffel Tower is 3.9 km away.

name: Holiday Inn Paris - Gare de Lyon Bastille
description: Holiday Inn® Paris - Gare de Lyon Bastille offers contemporary rooms and suites with ideal for business and leisure travel. Housed in a belle époque building, our central Paris hotel is a five-minute walk from the renowned Gare de Lyon, a major hub for metro and RER trains. Start the day with our breakfast buffet and meet for evening drinks in our buzzy bar and restaurant. Plan a meeting or event in one of our seven venues, including the skylit Opera Room. Walk to iconic Paris attractions such as the grand Opera de Bastille and the Accor Arena. Stroll along the River Seine to the Notre Dame cathedral or take a short train ride to La Défense business district Traveling with family? Kids stay free and we’re only a 35-minute train ride to Disneyland.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Select Hotel - Rive Gauche
description: Located in the heart of the Latin Quarter, in Paris’s lively 5th arrondissement is Select Hotel. Notre Dame Cathedral is 900 metres away. Combining classic architecture and modern design, it provides luxurious accommodation in a peaceful setting. The air-conditioned rooms at the Select Hotel feature WiFi access, en suite facilities and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms overlook the Place de la Sorbonne or the inner courtyard. Guests can enjoy breakfast in the 18th-century vaulted breakfast room before setting off for a day at work or sightseeing in Paris. Later, have afternoon tea with cakes or a relaxing drink in the contemporary bar. Guests can also purchase fast track tickets to attractions such as the Eiffel tower, Palace of Versailles and Disneyland Amusement Park at the hotel's reception upon prior request. The numerous Metro stops surrounding the hotel make Paris’ attractions very accessible. Both Saint Michel Metro Station and Saint Michel Fountain are 600 metres away while Jardin du Luxembourg is a short 3-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Whistler
description: Hotel Whistler is located in the 10th arrondissement of Paris, 1.2 km from La Cigale Concert Hall and in between Gare du Nord and Gare de l'Est train stations. Hotel Whistler features free WiFi throughout the property. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some private bathrooms are fitted with a bath. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and slippers. A continental breakfast is served every morning for an extra fee. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. For a supplement and subject to availability, guests can privatise the hammam between 08:00 and 20:00. Sacré-Coeur is 1.3 km from Hotel Whistler, while Place de la République is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: Le Petit Oberkampf Hotel & Spa
description: Welcome to the Hotel Beaumarchais! Our hotel is situated at the edge of the historic and cultural district of the Marais, just a stone's throw from the famous Place des Vosges and the local art galleries and museums. The bustling rue Oberkampf offers a lively environment with its typically Parisian cafés, bars and restaurants.WIHP

name: Victoire & Germain
description: The Victoire & Germain hotel is located in the Saint-Germain area of Paris, 1 km from Notre-Dame Cathedral and 1.2 km from the Louvre Museum. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel and there is a 24-hour front desk. Every room in the hotel features air conditioning and soundproofing, as well as a flat-screen TV and coffee machine. All bathrooms have a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Rooms are decorated in a contemporary style. Breakfast is available at Victoire & Germain. Several restaurants and cafés are located within a few minutes’ walk of the hotel. This hotel is situated 260 metres from Odéon Metro Station. Orly Airport is located a 30-minute drive away and Charles de Gaulle Airport is 40 minutes’ drive from the hotel. Paid public parking is available.

name: Amastan Paris
description: Offering a terrace and views of the garden, Amastan Paris is located in Paris, a 5-minute walk from the Champs Elysées, Franklin D. Roosevelt Metro Station and Avenue Montaigne. Amastan Paris features free WiFi, a library and a 24 hour reception. Guests can enjoy a selection of drinks including cocktails and light snacks made with fresh produce under the glass roof of the hotel's bar, Anouk. Serviced by a lift, the air-conditioned, contemporary rooms include a coffee machine, an iPod dock and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The rooms also feature a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and slippers. Some rooms also have a private balcony. A clothes rack can be provided upon request. Breakfast is served daily and can be served in the room. The hotel is only a 3-minute walk from Saint-Philippe du Roule Metro Station and a 5-minute drive from Arc de Triomphe and Opera Garnier. The Grand Palais and Petit Palais are 800 metres away, while Tuileries Garden is 1.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: Best Western Allegro Nation
address: 33, Avenue du Docteur Arnold Netter, 75012 Paris
description: Enjoy your stay in Paris at the Best Western Allegro Nation, a four star hotel, situated in eastern Paris near the Palais Omnisport of Bercy. The hotel is also near the Bastille Opera House and the Francois Mitterrand national library. Each of the hotel's 49 bedrooms is equipped with a bath, satellite television, direct dial telephone and Wi-Fi. And of course, the Best Western Allegro Nation is fully air-conditioned and has private parking. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel at Gare du Nord
description: This hotel is located in central Paris, next to Gare du Nord. The hotel has a 24 hour reception and guestrooms with lift access, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The Hotel de l'Aqueduc offers a buffet breakfast and the reception provides daily newspapers. The Gare du Nord and Gare de l’Est are situated next to the hotel. They offer metro, rail and Eurostar links throughout Paris and beyond. The Canal Saint-Martin is just 400 metres from the Hotel de l'Aqueduc and Montmartre is 1 km away. Guests can take the RER direct to Parc des Expositions de Villepinte in 30 minutes.

name: Mom'Art Hotel
description: Maison Mom'Art is conveniently located in the popular 18th - Sacre Coeur - Montmartre area. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, postal service, taxi service, ticket service, wheelchair accessible are just some of the facilities on offer. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Enjoy the fitness center, sauna, massage before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Maison Mom'Art.Agoda

name: Hôtel & Spa Saint Jacques
description: Hotel Saint Jacques offers comfortable en suite accommodation in the heart of Paris’ Latin Quarter. It is near Ile de la Cite and Notre Dame Cathedral. Each Hotel Saint Jacques room is soundproofed and equipped with a private bathroom and satellite TV. Guests are invited to relax with a glass of wine in the hotel’s Toulouse Lautrec lounge. The lounge features a collection of 18th and 19th-century books that guests can leaf through. There are a variety of dining options near the hotel. Staff can organise excursions for you or reserve restaurants on request. Massage treatments and transfers can also be arranged. Saint Jacques’ location makes it an ideal base for exploring Paris. It is just 1 minute on foot from the Maubert–Mutualite Metro (line 10) and Boulevard Saint-Germain. The Gallo-Roman amphitheater, Arenes de Lutece, is 600 metres away. A public parking is available within a 5-minute walk from the property.

name: Le Grey hotel
description: Located halfway between the Opéra Garnier and Montmartre, Le Grey Hôtel is a boutique hotel offering stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi access and an LCD TV. It provides luggage storage and it has a 24-hour reception. Serviced by a lift, all of the air-conditioned rooms feature contemporary décor and have a bathroom with rain shower or bathtub and free toiletries. They are non-smoking and soundproofed, and include a safety deposit box and minibar. A continental buffet breakfast is served in the morning and the hotel has a lounge and a bar. Complimentary tea, coffee and snacks are available throughout the day. Room service is available and a wide range of brasseries and restaurants can be found in the surrounding area. The Grands Magasins department stores are a 20-minute walk away. Liège Metro Station, 100 metres away, provides access to the Champs Elysées and the Opéra Garnier in 15 minutes. Saint-Lazare Train Station is 500 metres away.

name: Le Tourville Eiffel
description: Le Tourville Eiffel offers charming accommodation with a neo-classic décor, just a 10-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. The hotel’s bar is a good place to relax after a long day of work or sightseeing. Guest rooms are air-conditioned, individually decorated and feature a flat-screen satellite TV with international channels. Some have a private terrace and the suites have a spa bath. All rooms provide bathrobes and slippers. A continental breakfast is served every morning in the communal lounge and there is also the option to have a take-away breakfast. You can access sights such as Place de la Concorde directly from Ecole Militaire Metro Station (Line 8), 250 metres away.

name: Montfleuri Hotel
address: 21, Avenue de la Grande Armée, 75116 Paris
description: Located in the chic 16th district, this boutique hotel is 500 metres from the famous Champs Elysées and 800 metres from Porte Maillot and its Palais des Congrès. All air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi access and a minibar. Each classic room features a dressing room and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at hotel Montfleuri. Guests can enjoy a drink in the bar, while using the free Wi-Fi access. Dinners in jars are available for room service. With a 24-hour reception, the Montfleuri also provides a concierge service on site. Charles de Gaulle-Etoile Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away, and provides access to the Louvre Museum.

name: Hotel Flanelles Paris
description: Boasting a bar and a spa and wellness centre, Maison ELLE Paris is set in Paris, 600 metres from Arc de Triomphe and 1.4 km from Palais des Congrès de Paris. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel offers a sauna and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Maison ELLE Paris all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. Eiffel Tower is 2.3 km from the accommodation, while Gare Saint-Lazare is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 23 km from Maison ELLE Paris.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Sydney Opera
description: Situated in the heart of the business area, within walking distance of the Opera house, the Madeleine Church and the Concorde Place, the Best Western Plus® Hotel Sydney Opera has a preferred location between Hausmann Department Stores and luxurious shops of the Fauborg Saint Honore. The hotel offers 36 rooms in a Napoleon III-style building with all modern equipment. They were all recently renovated. Free Wi-Fi access is available in rooms and public areas. Croissants and home-made pastries will help you start a good day. You have direct access to public transportation (subway, Paris RER, etc.) to go to the business district of La Defense, Paris Expo Porte de Versailles, to reach Gare du Nord or to have fun at Disneyland® Paris.bestwestern.com

name: Auberge de Jeunesse HI Paris Yves Robert
description: Located in Paris, Auberge de Jeunesse HI Paris Yves Robert is 1.5 km from Sacré-Coeur. The accommodation is a member of the Hostelling International Network and offers a restaurant, bar, shared lounge, evening entertainment, shared kitchen, terrace and 24-hour front desk. At the hostel each room has a wardrobe and a private shower. A continental breakfast is available daily at Auberge de Jeunesse HI Paris Yves Robert. La Cigale Concert Hall is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Opéra Garnier is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18 km from Auberge de Jeunesse HI Paris Yves Robert.

name: Hôtel Orphée - Orso hotel
description: This 3-star hotel is located 800 metres from the Museum of Natural History and the Jardin des Plantes. It offers free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception, just 50 metres from Saint-Marcel Metro Station. The guest rooms at Hotel Orphée - Orso Hotels have an LCD TV with satellite channels. All rooms are air-conditioned and some have a private balcony. You can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the breakfast room every morning. There is also the option to take a continental breakfast in the comfort of your room. The River Seine is 600 metres from the hotel and Austerlitz Train Station is 400 metres away. You can also use local transport to access the Lively Place de la République or the Sorbonne directly.

name: Hotel Sookie
description: Attractively located in Paris, HOTEL SOOKIE features a continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.3 km from Pompidou Centre. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at HOTEL SOOKIE have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms have a seating area. The rooms have a safety deposit box. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Gare de l'Est, Opéra Bastille and Notre Dame Cathedral. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 17 km from HOTEL SOOKIE.

name: Hotel Saint Marcel
description: Featuring free WiFi, Hôtel Saint Marcel offers accommodation in Paris, 1.9 km from AccorHotels Arena. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and get some exercise in the fitness room. Rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain rooms have a seating area where you can relax. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer in the bathroom. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Notre Dame Cathedral is 2 km from Hôtel Saint Marcel, while Opéra Bastille is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Orly Airport, 12 km from the property.

name: Mercure Paris Place D'italie
description: Located in the heart of a quintessential Parisian suburb in the 13th arrondissement, Mercure Paris Place d'Italie immerses you in a world of haute couture with its fashion-inspired decor and display of designer gowns. In this completely renovated hotel are a meeting room and elegant guest accommodation, including four family rooms and Privilege rooms with views of the Eiffel Tower. Each morning, we are pleased to serve a delicious breakfast featuring regional fare from a small market nearby.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Moderniste
description: Located in a beautiful and very quiet "bourgeois street" in the 15th arrondissement of Paris, in the heart of the Convention district and very close to the Porte de Versailles Exhibition Center, the Hotel Moderniste opens its doors after a complete renovation. This brand new 4-star boutique hotel is a beautiful example of 1930s architecture in Paris and immerses us in the avant-garde atmosphere of this resolutely modern era. Structured on 7 floors, the Hotel Moderniste offers 40 very comfortable rooms in a resolutely modern decor Particular attention has been paid to the bedding and soundproofing of each room to ensure optimal sleep in the heart of the capital.

name: Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon
description: Located in Paris and within 1.8 km of Opéra Bastille, Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon features a bar, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is set 1.2 km from Paris-Gare-de-Lyon, 3.6 km from Notre Dame Cathedral and 3.7 km from Pompidou Centre. The hotel has family rooms. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are fitted with a seating area. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A buffet, continental or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the snack bar. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French. Sainte-Chapelle is 3.8 km from the accommodation, while Luxembourg Gardens is 4.2 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 16 km from Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon.

name: Hotel Victor Hugo Paris Kléber
description: Set in a quiet and privileged district, Hôtel Victor Hugo Paris Kléber is walking distance from the Champs Elysées and Trocadero Square, and a 3-minute walk from Victor Hugo metro station. Boissière metro station on line 6 is a 5-minute walk away. In a Parisian building, Hôtel Victor Hugo Paris Kléber offers air-conditioned rooms equipped with a desk, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms comes with a bathroom fitted with a bath, hairdryer and free toiletries. You can glance through the novels of Victor Hugo in the library and enjoy breakfast in the inner garden at an extra charge. There is a 24-hour front desk as well as facilities for disabled guests available at this property. The Eiffel Tower is 20 minutes away by public transport, while Palais des Congrès Convention Center is 15 minutes away from Hôtel Victor Hugo Paris Kléber.

name: Hôtel de Banville
description: This hotel is just a 15-minute walk from the Champs-Elysées and the Arc de Triomphe. It offers modern accommodation with free Wi-Fi access. Each guest room has a private bathroom and some rooms offer a balcony or an Eiffel Tower view. They are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A breakfast buffet with homemade pastries is served daily in the lobby area. Guests can also relax by the fireplace in the bar. Hôtel de Banville is a 2-minute walk from the restaurants at Place du Maréchal-Juin and close to the Porte Maillot Convention Centre and Espace Champerret. Porte de Champerret Metro Station is 100 metres away. Private airport transfers can be organised at the 24-hour reception.

name: Hotel Régina Opéra Grands Boulevards
description: Hôtel Regina Opéra Grands Boulevards is located in central Paris in the lively Grands Boulevards district, near theatres, concert halls. The Regina is a 10-minute walk from Canal Saint-Martin and just a 3-minute walk from Bonne Nouvelle Metro Station, which offers direct access to Place de la Concorde and the Eiffel Tower. The modern, air-conditioned rooms are decorated in warm colours and feature a satellite TV, free WiFi access and soundproofing. They also have a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms are serviced by a lift. A buffet breakfast offering fresh products is served each morning in the bright breakfast room. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the bar. Hotel Regina offers a 24-hour reception and free newspapers, as well as a laundry and a dry cleaning service. Restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance. Guests can also easily visit the Marais district and Le Louvre is a short Metro ride away.

name: Hôtel De Buci
description: This classical style, 4-star hotel is located in the Saint Germain area of Paris. Hôtel De Buci offers luxuriously decorated rooms with antique furnishings in the heart of the Latin Quarter. The soundproofed guest rooms at Hôtel De Buci have a typical Parisian charm with their velvet curtains and antique wooden furniture. Each room features Cable TV and a minibar. The Hôtel De Buci serves a buffet breakfast daily in the elegant breakfast room, and the hotel also features a 24-hour bar. Guests can visit the most famous sights of Paris easily, such as the Louvre and the Luxembourg Gardens, both of which are less than 10 minutes by foot from the hotel. There is also a concierge service for guests needing travel information.

name: Au Manoir Saint Germain
description: The Manoir Saint Germain is located next to the Saint-Germain-des-Prés Metro Station. This 4-star hotel overlooks the Deux Magots café and offers soundproofed accommodation with free internet access. Each guest room at the Manoir Saint Germain has a traditional décor with woodwork beds. They are also equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and air conditioning. Some rooms have a view of the Saint-Germain-des-Prés Church and the Deux Magots café. A breakfast buffet is served daily and guests can relax in the bar or on the patio. The hotel also provides a 24-hour reception with a tour desk. Au Manoir Saint Germain is just a 15-minute walk from the Musée d’Orsay and Le Louvre. The hotel is a short Metro ride from the Champs Elysées and the Eiffel Tower. Luxembourg Gardens are 750 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel de l'Abbaye
description: Ideally located in the centre of Paris, Hôtel de l'Abbaye offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. With a private bathroom fitted with a bath and a hairdryer, some units at Hôtel de l'Abbaye also have a terrace. At the accommodation all rooms include a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Guests at Hôtel de l'Abbaye can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Luxembourg Gardens, Rodin Museum and Orsay Museum. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 15 km from Hôtel de l'Abbaye.

name: Hôtel Belloy Saint-Germain
description: Hôtel Belloy Saint Germain is located in the historic Saint Germain district, near the Luxembourg Gardens and Notre Dame Cathedral. It offers modern air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV. The rooms are equipped with free Wi-Fi, satellite channels, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom. Rooms are accessible by a lift. The restaurant provides a buffet breakfast served in the classy dining area. Guests can enjoy a drink from the hotel’s honesty bar. This hotel’s central location allows guests to explore the nearby areas such as the lively Saint-Michel and Odeon. Metro Cluny – La Sorbonne is 270 metres from the hotel, giving guests access to famous sites such as the Eiffel Tower and Jardin des Plantes.

name: Hotel Tilsitt Etoile
description: The hotel is situated in quiet and typically paved Parisian street 350 metres from the Arc de Triomphe and a 5-minute walk from Avenue Champs Elysées. It offers rooms under the mansard on the sixth floor that overlook the rooftops of Paris. All of the rooms offer free high-speed WiFi internet access. At the Tilsitt Etoile,breakfast is served in the winter garden which features a patio and a fountain. Gluten free breakfast is available upon request. Guests can enjoy coffee facilities at the bar from 11:00. Place de l'Etoile is just 200 metres away leading to Place de la Concorde and Musée du Louvre. The Eiffel Tower is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Trema
description: Featuring free WiFi, Hotel Trema offers accommodation in Paris, 3.9 km from Sacré-Coeur and 120 metres from Crimée Metro Station. The property is also a 4-minute walk from the Bassin de la Villette, which features 3 free outdoor pools open from mid-June to mid-September and activities such as water sports and cruises. Rooms are soundproofed, and come with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. Each has its own private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Place de la République is 3.6 km from Hotel Trema, while Pompidou Centre is 5.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Charles De Gaulle Airport, 26.3 km from Hotel Trema. Les Docks de Paris Event Venue are 2.3 km away.

name: Hotel Square
description: Hotel Square is a 5-star boutique hotel in Paris, opposite the Eiffel Tower. It offers elegant rooms and suites with air-conditioning, flat-screen TV with international channels and free Wi-Fi. Beaugrenelle Shopping Centre is a 7-minute walk away and Rue de Passy is 1 km from the hotel. The guestrooms and suites also offer elegant marble bathrooms with bathtub and shower. A Hi-Fi stereo with a CD player, minibar and work desk can also be found in the rooms. There are 2 lounge areas in the Square where guests can relax in front of a large, plasma-screen TV with cable channels. Upon advanced request, the lounges can be used for private receptions. Spa Nuxe is 200m² and offers a variety of well-being and relaxation treatments including massage, a range of beauty treatments and much more. The nearest metro stations are Javel Metro Station, an 11-minute walk from Hotel Square and Passy Metro Station, 14 minutes' walk from the property. RER train station Avenue du Président Kennedy is a 5-minute walk from the property. The hotel has its own parking garage.

name: Hotel Louvre Bons Enfants
description: The Bons Enfants Hotel is located opposite Le Musée du Louvre and the Jardin des Tuileries in central Paris. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi access. With bright, modern decor, each room at the Hotel Louvre Bons Enfants has a private bathroom, a satellite TV and a radio. All rooms are equipped with a safety deposit box. A continental buffet breakfast is available every morning and can be served in the guest’s room. The Louvre Bons Enfants Hotel also provides a 24-hour reception and a car hire service. Many of Paris’s tourist attractions and shopping areas are within walking distance of this 1st arrondissement hotel. Notre Dame is a 20-minute walk away; the Centre Georges Pompidou is a 16-minute walk. The Palais Royal Musée du Louvre Metro station is 200 metres away and offers direct access to the Champs Elysees and the Opéra Garnier (Metro lines 1 and 7).

name: Hôtel Les Jardins de La Villa
description: Set in a period building, Les Jardins De La Villa hotel offers guest rooms overlooking the landscaped courtyard. With a 24-hour reception, it features a fitness room, a sauna and a hammam. The soundproofed rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a minibar and free WiFi access. Some rooms feature a seating area. Some rooms open onto flowery balcony at Jardins De La Villa. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room with a retractable roof. Guests can enjoy drinks from the bar. This 4-star hotel is located just 400 metres from the Palais des Congrès and the Arc de Triomphe is 1.2 km away. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Hotel Pavillon Bastille
description: Just a 5-minute walk from the Gare de Lyon Train and Metro Station, this renovated 19th-century townhouse is located opposite the Bastille Opera House. Free Wi-Fi access and cable TV are provided in all rooms. The stylish guest rooms are air-conditioned and decorated in neutral tones. Each room at Le Pavillon Bastille has welcome tray with tea, coffee and Infusion. The private bathrooms all include a hairdryer. Continental and buffet breakfasts are available daily and can be taken in the Pavillon’s landscaped courtyard and in the breakfast room according the weather. Staff are available 24 hours to advise on dining options and sights in the area, and a meeting room is available, upon prior reservation. Place des Vosges with its independent art galleries and the fashion boutiques of the Marais district are 15 minutes on foot. Bastille Metro Station is 150 metres from the hotel and offers many direct links to Paris sights including the Louvre and Galeries Lafayette.

name: ibis Paris Levallois-Perret
description: Located in the heart of Levallois, just a stone's throw from the Louise Michel metro station, the ibis Levallois Perret hotel is perfectly located for getting to St Lazare, Porte Maillot, La Défense and the Espace Champerret. The ibis Levallois Perret hot el has 53 completely renovated rooms, equipped with the new Sweet Bed by ibis bedding, air-conditioning and free WIFI. The hotel also has a bar with a terrace and a 24-hour snack service. Paying public car park close to the hotel.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Magda Champs Elysées
description: The Arc de Triomphe is just 190 metres from this 3-star hotel. It features a bar and offers modern guest rooms with free internet access. Palais des Congrès Convention Centre is reachable within 7 minutes from Magda Champs Elysées using public transport. All of the elegant guest rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some rooms feature a seating area and overlook the courtyard at Magda Champs Elysées. The rooms also include the use of a personal smartphone, offering unlimited calls to over 100 countries. It also has a WiFi terminal, free video streaming services and many other free apps. Each private bathroom includes a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served every morning and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar in hotel Magda Champs Elysées. With public parking available nearby, the hotel is a 6-minute walk from the famous Champs Elysées. Charles de Gaulle – Etoile Metro Station is 190 metres away and provides direct access to the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre Museum and La Défense business area.

name: Hyatt Paris Madeleine
description: Hyatt Paris Madeleine is located in central Paris, a 5-minute walk from Madeleine. It features a fitness and spa centre with sauna and massage treatments. Each air-conditioned room is individually decorated and has luxury modern wooden furnishings in light coloured tones. They have views over the Parisian Streets or the courtyard. They also feature a suite bathroom with a bathtub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Le Cafe M restaurant serves breakfast and lunches prepared with seasonal produce. La Chinoiserie serves fresh, local cuisine and a gourmet dinner. It also offers snacks and drinks. Hyatt Paris Madeleine is situated a 5-minute walk from the famous shopping district Boulevard Haussmann, and 10-minutes from the Champs-Élysées. Saint-Augustin Metro Station is 500 metres from the hotel, giving guests access to all of Paris’s famous sites.

name: Hotel Les Bulles De Paris
description: Inspired by champagne, Hotel Les Bulles De Paris is set in the heart of Paris' Latin Quarter, between Notre Dame and the Pantheon, not far from Luxembourg Gardens. Free WiFi access is available. Each designer room provides an LCD TV, and a minibar. Featuring a shower, the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. Some rooms also include a coffee machine, bathrobes and slippers. At Les Bulles De Paris you can enjoy champagnes from around France as well as the hotel’s exclusive champagne. A sweet and savoury breakfast buffet is taken in the dining room that features a sparkling chandelier. Renowned cafes and popular spots for lunch are available in the surrounding area. The hotel is also conveniently located for shopping in the Marais district and Boulevard Saint Germain, and the historic department store, Le Bon Marché. A private, wellness area with sauna, hammam and treatment rooms is accessible at an extra charge. The hotel is 1.2 km from Louvre Museum and 1.3 km from Pompidou Centre. Maubert-Mutualité Metro Station is only 180 metres away.

name: Hotel Monte Cristo
description: Featuring a bar, Hôtel Montecristo is set in Paris, 1.9 km from Notre Dame Cathedral. The property is around 2.5 km from Opéra Bastille and 2.8 km from Pompidou Centre. The hotel features an indoor pool and a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower and free toiletries, while certain rooms come with a seating area. All guest rooms at Hôtel Montecristo include air conditioning and a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and an indoor pool. A business centre and vending machines with drinks are available on site at Hôtel Montecristo. Louvre Museum is 3 km from the hotel, while Orsay Museum is 3.5 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 13 km away.

name: Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa
description: Boasting a restaurant, bar and views of city, Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa is set in Paris, less than 1 km from Gare Saint-Lazare. With a terrace, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, the rooms come with a desk. Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa features some units that feature a balcony, and the rooms are equipped with a coffee machine. All guest rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a TV with satellite channels and an iPad. Guests at Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Opéra Garnier, Pigalle Metro Station and La Cigale Concert Hall. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport, 24 km from Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa.

name: Hôtel & Spa Royal Madeleine
description: Boasting a fitness centre and a spa & wellness centre, Royal Madeleine Hotel & Spa is situated in Paris. It is 600 metres from Édouard VII Theatre, 500 metres from Olympia and Opéra Garnier and a 14-minute walk from Tuileries Garden. The property is located in the 8th arr. District, 1.4 km from Orsay Museum. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a desk and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. With a private bathroom, they also feature free WiFi. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. There is an in-house restaurant, which serves European cuisine. When guests need guidance on where to visit, the reception will be happy to provide advice. Galeries Lafayette and Printemps Department Stores are 400 metres away. La Cigale Concert Hall is a 19-minute walk from Royal Madeleine Hotel & Spa, while Louvre Museum is a 20-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly, 16 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Parister & Spa
description: Located in Paris, a 2-minute walk from Cadet Metro Station and the Folies Bergère Theatre, and 1.2 km from Opera Garnier, Hotel Parister & Spa features restaurant and a bar, as well as a spa center with a swimming-pool, hammam and a fitness centre available for free. The air-conditioned rooms features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. They all have a Marshall speaker and a private bathroom with free Nuxe toiletries, bathrobes and slippers, while some features a spa bath. Hotel Parister & Spa features free WiFi throughout the property. Breakfast are available each morning from 7am to 10am and until 10.30am on Sunday. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Sacré-Coeur is 1.3 km from Hotel Parister & Spa. Paris - Orly Airport is 16 km away.

name: Hotel Villathena
description: The Villathena is a design hotel located in the Opera district of Paris. It offers air conditioned accommodation with a contemporary décor, a free Wi-Fi access and a 24-hour reception. Each guest room at Hotel Villathena offers a flat screen TV with a DVD player and a minibar. All have a private bathroom complete with amenities and a hairdryer. The buffet breakfast is offered daily in the breakfast room. The continental breakfast can also be served in guest’s rooms. The Hotel is situated 300 metres from Saint Lazare Metro Station. It provides direct access to the Avenue Champs-Elysées and Place de la Concorde. Guests can also walk to Galeries Lafayette in 10 minutes. When booking more than 4 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

name: The Remix Hotel
description: Refurbished by the well-known designer Saar Zafrir, The ReMIX Hotel offers a bar, co-working space, 10 meeting rooms and a gym in the trendy La Villette district in Paris. The modern guest rooms are decorated with a blend of Parisian glamour and 80s rock and feature headboards with integrated USB ports, high speed WiFi and a flat-screen TV with Chromecast. The marble bathrooms have a shower or a bathtub. A buffet breakfast is available from 06:30 to 10:00, and guests can enjoy a coffee in the co-working space. The reception is open 24 hours a day. The Zénith and Philharmonie de Paris concert venues are within a 10-minute walk of The ReMIX Hotel. The hotel is served by metro lines 7, 5 and 3b, as well as the RER E, and areas such as the Opéra district can be reached within 15 minutes. The hotel can also be reached via bike along the Ourcq Canal and there is a public bike station nearby.

name: Hotel Murat
description: Hotel Murat is located in the 16th district of Paris, close to the banks of the River Seine. It is just 150 metres from the Porte de Saint-Cloud Metro Station, which leads directly to Place du Trocadéro. This 19th-century building provides en suite rooms equipped with satellite TV, Wi-Fi internet access and a hairdryer. Hotel Murat serves a daily buffet breakfast. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s bar and lounge area where complimentary newspapers are available. The Parc des Princes and Roland Garros Stadiums are within easy access of the hotel. The town of Boulogne-Billancourt is 1 km away.

name: Hotel Palym
description: Hotel Palym is located on a quiet street just 2 minutes from Gare de Lyon and a 15-minute walk from AccorHotels Arena. It offers modern accommodation with Wi-Fi access. Rooms at Palym are decorated in warm colours and offer an LCD TV with cable channels. All rooms have a private bathroom and some feature an antique fireplace. Fresh Viennese pastries and fruit are served in the breakfast room every morning. Non-alcoholic and hot beverages are also served at the bar which is in the colourful lounge area. The hotel is just a 10-minute walk from Paris’ China Town and local transport links lead directly to sights such as Le Louvre and Le Marais district.

name: Hotel Arc de Triomphe Etoile
description: Arc De Triomphe Etoile is located in the centre of Paris, just a 5-minute walk from the Place de l'Etoile and the Champs Elysées. It offers classic air-conditioned rooms. All rooms at the Arc de Triomphe Etoile are equipped with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire hotel. A minibar features in each room and the private bathrooms include a hairdryer. A full buffet breakfast is served every morning and a modern bar is at your disposal along with daily newspapers. The hotel Arc de Triomphe Etoile also provides a 24-hour reception with laundry facilities and an elevator that services all floors. Metro Ternes is 220 metres away and gives guests access to all of Paris’s famous sites. Metro Charles de Gaulle–Etolie has a direct train to Disneyland.

name: Timhotel Opera Blanche Fontaine
description: At 200 metres from the famous Moulin Rouge, the Timhotel Opra Blanche Fontaine will welcome you between the Opera districts and Montmartre. Located not far from the gare Saint-Lazare, the Department Stores (Galeries Lafayette Boulevard Haussmann) and the boulevard de Clichy, the hotel proposes a very relaxing and quiet place in the heart of a bustling area oriented towards music and theatre: ideal to discover world renowned Parisian shows and to get to the strategic points of the Capital.In a beautiful private courtyard away from the bustle, the Timhotel Opra Blanche Fontaine will welcome you 24H/24 in three languages. In addition to its air-conditioned rooms, some of which with a view over the Eiffel Tower or Montmartre, the hotel will propose to you a generous breakfast on a buffet, LCD screens, a parking and the free WIFI. The particularly warm welcome will orient you towards the best tips to discover the Paris of the Parisians. Complete offer of services and of catering at any time in the area.iHotelier/iStay

name: Villa Eiffel Mademoiselle
description: Situated in Paris and with Rodin Museum reachable within 2.4 km, Villa Eiffel Mademoiselle features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room is fitted with a kettle, while some rooms have a balcony and others also boast city views. At Villa Eiffel Mademoiselle rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Eiffel Tower is 2.4 km from the accommodation, while Orsay Museum is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 15 km from Villa Eiffel Mademoiselle.

name: Serotel Lutece
description: Serotel Lutèce is located in Paris, a 10-minute walk from Jardin du Luxembourg. It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms, some feature a private balcony. Each room has classic décor and is equipped with satellite TV, tea and coffee making facilities and private bathroom. All rooms are accessible by lift. A buffet breakfast is served daily at the Serotel Lutèce’s chic dining area. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar or on the terrace overlooking the garden. The hotel provides an airport shuttle service. A 24-hour front desk with laundry facilities is available. Censier – Daubenton Metro station is 500 metres from Serotel Lutèce, giving direct access to Opera and Chatelet. Jardin des Plantes is 850 metres from the hotel, River Seine and Notre Dame Cathedral is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Hôtel Beige
description: The Hôtel Beige is located in the heart of Paris between the Opéra Garnier and Montmartre. Its rooms offer views over the rooftops of Paris. All of the en suite rooms at Hôtel Beige+ are soundproofed and have flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Coffee, tea and drinks can be enjoyed in the hotel’s ground-floor lounge, where a daily breakfast buffet is also served. During their stay, guests can rent a portable WiFi key from the reception, available for a fee. Hôtel Beige is serviced by a lift and offers 24-hour front desk service and free luggage storage.

name: Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile
description: Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile, formerly the Hotel Concorde La Fayette, is 1.5 km from both the Arc de Triomphe and the famous Champs Elysées. The guest rooms each include a desk, cable TV, air conditioning and a safe. All rooms at the Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile offers views over Paris. Deluxe bath products are provided in the private bathrooms. MAYO restaurant in the lobby of the hotel offers guests a seasonal cuisine and local products. This hotel is connected to the Palais des Congrès and La Defense business district is only 5 minutes away by Metro. A concierge and a business centre are among the additional services. Porte Maillot Metro Station is an 8-minute walk away.

name: Dauphine Saint Germain
description: Nestled between Saint-Germain-des-Prés and The Latin Quarter, this boutique hotel is located in a 17th century building, a 10-minute walk from Notre Dame. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi internet access. Guest rooms at Dauphine Saint Germain are elegantly decorated and feature flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. Each room has an en suite bathroom with complimentary toiletries and rooms are serviced by a lift. Guests can enjoy a continental breakfast of fresh pastries and cereals served each morning in a breakfast room with an arched stone ceiling. A 24-hour room service is available for drinks and snacks. Dauphine Saint Germain offers free daily newspapers and a complimentary shoe shine service. Metro Station Saint-Michel is located a 5-minute walk from the hotel and offers direct access to the Montmartre District. The Louvre is a 20-minute walk away. An airport shuttle service can be requested at an extra charge.

name: Hotel Claret
description: This hotel is located 10 minutes from Gare de Lyon Train Station by foot. It offers guest rooms with satellite TV and free WiFi access. Each room has views of the garden or the street. The en suite bathrooms include a hairdryer. Bastille district is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Bercy Park and the Cinémathèque Museum are both just 300 metres away. Parking is available on site for an additional charge.

name: La Clef Louvre Paris by The Crest Collection
description: No description found

name: Majestic Hotel - Spa Champs Elysées
description: This 5-star hotel is located in Paris’s 16th district just 400 metres from Place de l'Étoile and the Arc de Triomphe. It offers air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant and guests have free access to the spa facilities. Rooms at Majestic Hotel Spa combine old Parisian style and more contemporary pieces of art. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, iPod docking stations and a private bathroom. Some rooms and suites have a private terrace or kitchenette. Wi-Fi access is available in all the rooms and the hotel also has facilities for disabled guests. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées wellness spa has a swimming pool, hammam and fitness room. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées is 190 metres from Kléber Metro Station (line 6) and 400 metres from Charles de Gaulle – Étoile Metro (lines 1, 2 and 6). The Eiffel Tower is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and the Champs Elysées is 5 minutes away.

name: Hôtel Clarisse
description: Clarisse is located in Paris, 700 metres from Parc des Expositions Exhibition Centre and 200 metres from Square Georges Brassens. This hotel was renovated in September 2018 and offers rooms with free WiFi access. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. All rooms are accessible by a lift. Breakfast is served daily in at the Clarisse’s dining room. The hotel is 350 metres from Metro Porte de Vanves, which has direct access to Invalides and Saint-Lazare. The T3 tramway stop is just opposite the hotel.

name: Hotel Des Mines
description: Hotel Des Mines is located in central Paris, 200 metres from the Jardin du Luxembourg and 1.5 km from Montparnasse Train Station. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi access. Each soundproofed room has simple décor and is equipped with satellite TV and a private bathroom. All rooms are serviced by a lift and featured a safety deposit box. Breakfast is served every morning in the dining room, or in the comfort of your own room. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar. Newspapers are featured. A 24-hour front-desk is available on site and express check-in/check-out can be provided. St-Germain des Prés and the Latin Quarter are just a 15-minute walk away. Hotel Des Mines is 300 metres from RER station Luxembourg, which leads directly to Notre Dame, Chatelet and Orly and CDG Airports.

name: Hotel Albe Bastille
description: Located in the heart of Paris, this hotel is decorated with original stonework and period artwork. It has an interior courtyard and provides free Wi-Fi access. Hotel Albe Bastille is entirely non-smoking, and the air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with an LCD TV and an iPod docking station. Breakfast is served every morning at hotel Albe Bastille, and guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Place des Vosges in the Marais district. The nearest Metro Station is just 250 metres away, providing access to the famous department store, Galeries Lafayette.

name: Auteuil Tour Eiffel
description: Located in the heart of the 16th-district of Paris, this modern hotel features private parking on site and a shaded terrace in the garden. It is situated 2 km from the Eiffel Tower and Bois de Boulogne and 3 km from Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre. The rooms at Auteuil Tour Eiffel are equipped with a satellite TV, free WiFi and tea and coffee making facilities. Each room has a private bathroom including a hairdryer and L'Occitane free toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony. A buffet breakfast including fresh bread, pastries and homemade specialities is served every morning. Organic products are available. The hotel offers a 24-hour reception, a sauna and a 24-hour fitness room. Wireless internet connection is also available in public areas. Guests can relax and enjoy a drink in the property's lounge. Auteuil Tour Eiffel is 500 metres from Mirabeau Metro Station and 600 metres from Avenue du Président Kennedy RER Train Station (Line C).

name: First Hotel Paris Tour Eiffel
description: First is located a 5-minute walk from the Champs de Mars and a 15-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. It is a design hotel offering air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony and free Wi-Fi access. Guest rooms and suites at First Hotel are contemporary in style and decorated in black and white. Each has an LCD TW with Free air channels and some have views of Paris’ rooftops or the Eiffel Tower. La Motte-Picquet-Grenelle Metro Station is 300 metres away and provides direct access to Trocadéro and the best views of the Eiffel Tower. Hotel des Invalides is just a 10-minute walk away. A deposit of €50" will be requested as a guarantee either by card or in cash returned on departure.

name: Hotel Aulivia Opera
description: Hotel Aulivia Opéra is located in Paris, a 2-minute walk from Château d'Eau Metro Station and a 11-minute walk from Gare du Nord Train Station. It also offers free WiFi. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a work desk and en suite facilities. Breakfast is served every morning and can be enjoyed in the breakfast room or in the guests' rooms. Friendly staff can advise on sightseeing in Paris and the local area. Restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance. A 24-hours front desk and a luggage storage are available at the property. The Canal Saint-Martin is 1 km from the property.

name: Hotel du Louvre in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
description: Located in the heart of Paris, this 5-star hotel offers elegant guest rooms in a Hausmannian-style building. Entirely renovated in 2019, it features a concierge and a tour desk with ticket service. Decorated in a unique style, the bright air-conditioned guest rooms at the Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt are equipped with satellite TV, a minibar and free WiFi access. Many rooms offer views of famous Parisian landmarks and all rooms have a private bathroom, some include decorated with marble. The hotel restaurant, La Brasserie du Louvre by Bocuse, was renovated in 2019 and is decorated in a traditional style with authentic features. The menu showcases iconic dishes by Bocuse, designed to delight locals and travellers alike. In the summer, meals are served on the terrace beneath the arches, with a view of the Louvre museum. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Guests can also enjoy a cocktail and jazz evenings twice a week in The Bar, which features an authentic glass roof. The 4 facades and terrace of this hotel overlook the famous Louvre Museum, the Opéra Garnier and the Comédie Française theatre. During spring and summer, a picnic basket can be requested for an extra charge, so guests can enjoy picnicking in the Parisian gardens near the hotel. Several activities are available to guests of the hotel free of charge to allow guests to discover hidden gems of the city, including boules at the Tuileries Garden, guided tours of the neighbourhood and a tour of the Napoléon III-style apartments at the Louvre Museum. Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt is situated 2 minutes from Palais Royal Metro Station, providing direct access to the Champs Elysees and the Place de la Bastille. Public parking is available nearby.

name: La Belle Ville
description: Located 4.9 km from Gare du Nord, La Belle Ville offers 4-star accommodation in Paris and features a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is allergy-free and is situated 5 km from Gare de l'Est. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at La Belle Ville have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are fitted with a terrace. At the accommodation each room has bed linen and towels. A buffet, continental or American breakfast is available daily at the property. Pompidou Centre is 5.1 km from La Belle Ville, while La Cigale Concert Hall is 5.7 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Litteraire Marcel Ayme, BW Premier Collection
description: Discover a literary hotel in Montmartre. With its retro 1950's decor inspired by the novels of Marcel Ayme and its location in Montmartre, a stone's throw from the legendary Moulin de la Galette and Moulin Rouge, The Hotel Litteraire Marcel Ayme, BW Premier Collection by Best Western invites you to stay in the heart of the district. artists. Benefiting from the proximity of the Redele car park and the Abbesses and Blanche metro stations, this 4 Star hotel is also served by bus lines 80, 95, 30 and 74. The Gare Saint-Lazare and the Nord train stations are 15 and 20 minutes away. The airports of Orly and Roissy at 50 and 40 minutes. All Standard and Superior rooms, as well as the studio and apartment of our hotel near the Moulin Rouge have free high-speed Internet access and air conditioning. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is included. With a bath or shower, the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and welcome products. As quiet as comfortable, furnished with Queen Size or King Size beds depending on their category, some of our accommodations offer views of the Eiffel Tower. Interconnecting rooms are available for families or groups of friends. In our hotel near the Sacre-Coeur, each day begins with a generous breakfast, served as a buffet from 7:00 a.m. to 10:30 a.m. Energize with our savory dishes, scrambled eggs, cheese platters and cold cuts, and remember the vitamins with a fresh juice. You can also enjoy pastries and cereals. Hot drinks, tea, coffee and chocolate are at your disposal. Our team speaking French, English, German, Spanish, Italian, Russian and Arabic welcomes you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week in our hotel near Saint-Lazare train station.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel de la Tamise
description: Hôtel de La Tamise is located in Paris, just opposite the Tuileries Gardens and a few metres from the Louvre Museum. The elegantly-decorated hotel features a 24-hour reception desk and a bar. The air-conditioned rooms and suites at Hôtel de La Tamise have free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All of the private bathroom will provide you with bathrobes, hairdryer, slippers and free toiletries. After a long day of sightseeing, you can sample a hot drink in the comfort of your room thanks to the electric kettle or the coffee machine. Extras include a desk, a safety deposit box and a laptop safe. Other facilities offered at the property include a ticket service and luggage storage. The hotel is 700 metres from Orsay Museum and 800 metres from Opéra Garnier. Tuileries Metro Station, 100 metres away, provides direct access to the famous Champs-Elysées.

name: La Villa Haussmann
description: Located in Paris, 1.1 km from Opéra Garnier, La Villa Haussmann boasts an indoor swimming pool and fitness centre. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant. The rooms at La Villa Haussmann are equipped with a flat-screen TV and some of the rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom and extras include bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Breakfast is served daily and guests can have a drink at the hotel's bar. Arc de Triomphe is 1.6 km from La Villa Haussmann, while Tuileries Garden is 1.6 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 17 km away.
